name: Brutal KB Complex (@Asgooch)
description: Quick but brutal single-bell complex from @Asgooch. Swing → Squat → Row → Push Up, 10 reps each, 4 rounds. Don't put the bell down between exercises.

exercises.notes: Alternate wide (A) and narrow (B) stance each rep.
Hands on the bell handles. Elbows tucked. Last exercise — earn that rest.

tips: Don't put the bell down between exercises — that's what makes it a complex
Complexes are @Asgooch's go-to for quick but brutal workouts
If 10 reps is too much, scale to 8 or 6 per exercise
The A/B stance squat alternates wide and narrow foot positions each rep
